20101225074421.000|20101225074427.000|CC1|    ? TO SEE THE BABY BOY ?     
20101225074427.000|20101225074427.000|CC1|A READING FROM THE BOOK OF      
20101225074427.000|20101225074430.000|CC1|    THE PROPHET ISAIAH.         
20101225074430.000|20101225074432.000|CC1|    CHAPTER 60.                 
20101225074432.000|20101225074432.000|CC1|      ARISE, SHINE!             
20101225074432.000|20101225074436.000|CC1|FOR YOUR LIGHT HAS COME,        
20101225074436.000|20101225074436.000|CC1|AND THE GLORY OF THE LORD       
20101225074436.000|20101225074440.000|CC1|   HAS RISEN UPON YOU!          
20101225074440.000|20101225074440.000|CC1|        FOR DARKNESS SHALL COVER
20101225074440.000|20101225074442.000|CC1|               THE EARTH,       
20101225074442.000|20101225074442.000|CC1|         AND PROFOUND DARKNESS  
20101225074442.000|20101225074445.000|CC1|       SHALL ENVELOP THE PEOPLE.
20101225074445.000|20101225074445.000|CC1|      BUT THE LORD WILL ARISE   
20101225074445.000|20101225074448.000|CC1|             UPON YOU,          
20101225074448.000|20101225074448.000|CC1|      AND THE GLORY OF THE LORD 
20101225074448.000|20101225074452.000|CC1|    WILL APPEAR ROUND ABOUT YOU.
20101225074452.000|20101225074452.000|CC1|         NATIONS SHALL COME     
20101225074452.000|20101225074454.000|CC1|            TO YOUR LIGHT       
20101225074454.000|20101225074454.000|CC1|         AND MONARCHS TO THE    
20101225074454.000|20101225074457.000|CC1|     BRIGHTNESS OF YOUR DAWNING.
20101225074457.000|20101225074457.000|CC1|THEN SHALL YOU SEE              
20101225074457.000|20101225074501.000|CC1|  AND BE RADIANT,               
20101225074501.000|20101225074501.000|CC1|YOUR HEART SHALL THRILL         
20101225074501.000|20101225074504.000|CC1|     AND REJOICE.               
20101225074504.000|20101225074504.000|CC1|          VIOLENCE SHALL NO MORE
20101225074504.000|20101225074506.000|CC1|          BE HEARD IN YOUR LAND,
20101225074506.000|20101225074506.000|CC1|          NEITHER SHALL THERE BE
20101225074506.000|20101225074509.000|CC1|                DEVASTATION     
20101225074509.000|20101225074509.000|CC1|               OR DESTRUCTION   
20101225074509.000|20101225074512.000|CC1|            WITHIN YOUR BORDERS.
20101225074512.000|20101225074512.000|CC1|       YOU SHALL CALL YOUR WALLS
20101225074512.000|20101225074515.000|CC1|              "SALVATION"       
20101225074515.000|20101225074517.000|CC1|        AND YOUR GATES "PRAISE."
20101225074517.000|20101225074518.000|CC1|THE SUN SHALL NO LONGER         
20101225074518.000|20101225074520.000|CC1|BE YOUR LIGHT BY DAY,           
20101225074520.000|20101225074520.000|CC1|NOR SHALL THE MOON GIVE         
20101225074520.000|20101225074524.000|CC1|LIGHT TO YOU BY NIGHT.          
20101225074524.000|20101225074524.000|CC1| BUT THE LORD WILL BE           
20101225074524.000|20101225074529.000|CC1|YOUR EVERLASTING LIGHT,         
20101225074529.000|20101225074531.000|CC1|AND GOD WILL BE YOUR GLORY.     
20101225074531.000|20101225074537.000|CC1|              THANKS BE TO GOD! 
20101225074537.000|20101225074539.000|CC1|     ? HAIL THE BLEST MORN ?    
20101225074539.000|20101225074544.000|CC1|   ? SEE THE GREAT MEDIATOR ?

20101225074549.000|20101225074554.000|CC1|         IN THE MANGER ?

20101225074843.000|20101225074846.000|CC1|FOR THE LORD OUR GOD.           
20101225074846.000|20101225074846.000|CC1|             FOR UNTO US A CHILD
20101225074846.000|20101225074848.000|CC1|                  IS BORN,      
20101225074848.000|20101225074848.000|CC1|              UNTO US A SON IS  
20101225074848.000|20101225074850.000|CC1|                   GIVEN.       
20101225074850.000|20101225074850.000|CC1|     AND THE GOVERNMENT SHALL BE
20101225074850.000|20101225074852.000|CC1|         UPON HIS SHOULDERS,    
20101225074852.000|20101225074852.000|CC1|             AND HIS NAME       
20101225074852.000|20101225074854.000|CC1|            SHALL BE CALLED     
20101225074854.000|20101225074854.000|CC1|           "WONDERFUL COUNSELOR,
20101225074854.000|20101225074856.000|CC1|                MIGHTY GOD,     
20101225074856.000|20101225074856.000|CC1|             EVERLASTING FATHER,
20101225074856.000|20101225074858.000|CC1|              PRINCE OF PEACE." 
20101225074858.000|20101225074858.000|CC1|          OF THE INCREASE OF HIS
20101225074858.000|20101225074901.000|CC1|          JUSTICE AND HIS PEACE,
20101225074901.000|20101225074903.000|CC1|          THERE SHALL BE NO END.
20101225074903.000|20101225074903.000|CC1| HE SHALL NOT JUDGE             
20101225074903.000|20101225074906.000|CC1|BY WHAT HIS EYES SEE,           
20101225074906.000|20101225074906.000|CC1|NOR DECIDE BY WHAT              
20101225074906.000|20101225074908.000|CC1|  HIS EARS HEAR.

20101225074908.000|20101225074911.000|CC1|      HE SHALL JUDGE            
20101225074911.000|20101225074912.000|CC1|IN FAVOR OF THE POOR            
20101225074912.000|20101225074912.000|CC1|  AND DECIDE WITH EQUITY        
20101225074912.000|20101225074915.000|CC1|FOR THE MEEK OF THE EARTH.      
20101225074915.000|20101225074915.000|CC1|            THE WOLF SHALL DWELL
20101225074915.000|20101225074917.000|CC1|               WITH THE LAMB,   
20101225074917.000|20101225074917.000|CC1|          AND THE LEOPARD SHALL 
20101225074917.000|20101225074920.000|CC1|          LIE DOWN WITH THE KID.
20101225074920.000|20101225074920.000|CC1|            THE COW AND THE BEAR
20101225074920.000|20101225074922.000|CC1|            SHALL GRAZE TOGETHER
20101225074922.000|20101225074922.000|CC1|            AND THE LION SHALL  
20101225074922.000|20101225074924.000|CC1|          EAT STRAW LIKE THE OX.
20101225074924.000|20101225074924.000|CC1| THE YOUNG CALF AND THE LION CUB
20101225074924.000|20101225074927.000|CC1|      SHALL LIVE TOGETHER,      
20101225074927.000|20101225074927.000|CC1|            AND A LITTLE CHILD  
20101225074927.000|20101225074929.000|CC1|             SHALL LEAD THEM.   
20101225074929.000|20101225074943.000|CC1|THANKS BE TO GOD!               
20101225074943.000|20101225074946.000|CC1|     ? WHAT CHILD IS THIS ?     
20101225074946.000|20101225074948.000|CC1|      ? WHO, LAID TO REST ?     
20101225074948.000|20101225074951.000|CC1|        ? ON MARY'S LAP ?

20101225075116.000|20101225075116.000|CC1|       WORDS OF SCRIPTURE       
20101225075116.000|20101225075120.000|CC1|         FROM ISAIAH 35.        
20101225075120.000|20101225075122.000|CC1|    THE DESERT WILL REJOICE.    
20101225075122.000|20101225075122.000|CC1|     THE FLOWERS WILL BLOOM     
20101225075122.000|20101225075126.000|CC1|       IN THE WASTELANDS.       
20101225075126.000|20101225075126.000|CC1|      THE DESERT WILL SING      
20101225075126.000|20101225075129.000|CC1|       AND SHOUT FOR JOY.       
20101225075129.000|20101225075131.000|CC1|     IT WILL BE AS BEAUTIFUL    
20101225075131.000|20101225075134.000|CC1|    AS THE LEBANON MOUNTAINS    
20101225075134.000|20101225075134.000|CC1|  AND AS FERTILE AS THE FIELDS  
20101225075134.000|20101225075139.000|CC1|      OF CARMEL AND SHARON.     
20101225075139.000|20101225075139.000|CC1|        EVERYONE WILL SEE       
20101225075139.000|20101225075141.000|CC1|       THE LORD'S SPLENDOR      
20101225075141.000|20101225075141.000|CC1|     AND SEE GOD'S GREATNESS    
20101225075141.000|20101225075145.000|CC1|           AND POWER.           
20101225075145.000|20101225075145.000|CC1|     GIVE STRENGTH TO HANDS     
20101225075145.000|20101225075149.000|CC1|         THAT ARE TIRED         
20101225075149.000|20101225075149.000|CC1|    AND TO KNEES THAT TREMBLE   
20101225075149.000|20101225075153.000|CC1|         WITH WEAKNESS.         
20101225075153.000|20101225075153.000|CC1|      TELL EVERYONE WHO IS      
20101225075153.000|20101225075156.000|CC1|          DISCOURAGED,          
20101225075156.000|20101225075156.000|CC1|           "BE STRONG           
20101225075156.000|20101225075158.000|CC1|      AND DON'T BE AFRAID.      
20101225075158.000|20101225075158.000|CC1|          GOD IS COMING         
20101225075158.000|20101225075201.000|CC1|         TO YOUR RESCUE,        
20101225075201.000|20101225075201.000|CC1|             COMING             
20101225075201.000|20101225075203.000|CC1|     TO PUNISH YOUR ENEMIES.    
20101225075203.000|20101225075203.000|CC1|  THE BLIND WILL BE ABLE TO SEE 
20101225075203.000|20101225075208.000|CC1|     AND THE DEAF WILL HEAR.    
20101225075208.000|20101225075210.000|CC1|  THE LAME WILL LEAP AND DANCE  
20101225075210.000|20101225075210.000|CC1|   AND THOSE WHO CANNOT SPEAK   
20101225075210.000|20101225075214.000|CC1|       WILL SHOUT FOR JOY.      
20101225075214.000|20101225075214.000|CC1|    THE STREAMS OF WATER WILL   
20101225075214.000|20101225075218.000|CC1|    FLOW THROUGH THE DESERT,    
20101225075218.000|20101225075218.000|CC1|        THE BURNING SAND        
20101225075218.000|20101225075222.000|CC1|       WILL BECOME A LAKE,      
20101225075222.000|20101225075222.000|CC1|      AND DRY LAND WILL BE      
20101225075222.000|20101225075225.000|CC1|    FILLED WITH THE SPRINGS.    
20101225075225.000|20101225075225.000|CC1|   WHERE JACKALS USED TO LIVE,  
20101225075225.000|20101225075231.000|CC1|MARSH GRASS AND REEDS WILL GROW.
20101225075231.000|20101225075231.000|CC1| THERE WILL BE A HIGHWAY THERE  
20101225075231.000|20101225075237.000|CC1| CALLED 'THE ROAD OF HOLINESS.' 
20101225075237.000|20101225075237.000|CC1|   NO SINNER WILL EVER TRAVEL   
20101225075237.000|20101225075240.000|CC1|           THAT ROAD.           
20101225075240.000|20101225075240.000|CC1|      NO FOOLS WILL MISLEAD     
20101225075240.000|20101225075243.000|CC1|      THOSE WHO FOLLOW IT.      
20101225075243.000|20101225075246.000|CC1|     NO LIONS WILL BE THERE.    
20101225075246.000|20101225075246.000|CC1|        NO FIERCE ANIMALS       
20101225075246.000|20101225075251.000|CC1|       WILL PASS THAT WAY.      
20101225075251.000|20101225075251.000|CC1| THOSE WHOM THE LORD HAS RESCUED
20101225075251.000|20101225075255.000|CC1|  WILL TRAVEL HOME BY THE ROAD. 
20101225075255.000|20101225075258.000|CC1|   THEY WILL REACH JERUSALEM,   
20101225075258.000|20101225075258.000|CC1|     WITH GLADNESS, SINGING,    
20101225075258.000|20101225075303.000|CC1|      AND SHOUTING FOR JOY.     
20101225075303.000|20101225075303.000|CC1|       THEY WILL BE HAPPY       
20101225075303.000|20101225075306.000|CC1|            FOREVER.            
20101225075306.000|20101225075306.000|CC1|    FOREVER, FREE FROM SORROW   
20101225075306.000|20101225075312.000|CC1|           AND GRIEF!"          
20101225075312.000|20101225075328.000|CC1|               ?                
20101225075328.000|20101225075328.000|CC1|          ? DING! DONG!

20101225075337.000|20101225075340.000|CC1|      WITH ANGELS SINGING ?

20101225075627.000|20101225075627.000|CC1|    A READING FROM THE GOSPEL   
20101225075627.000|20101225075632.000|CC1|  ACCORDING TO LUKE, CHAPTER 1. 
20101225075632.000|20101225075635.000|CC1|IN THE SIXTH MONTH,             
20101225075635.000|20101225075635.000|CC1|THE ANGEL GABRIEL WAS SENT      
20101225075635.000|20101225075639.000|CC1|          BY GOD                
20101225075639.000|20101225075639.000|CC1|TO A TOWN IN GALILEE            
20101225075639.000|20101225075643.000|CC1|  CALLED NAZARETH,              
20101225075643.000|20101225075645.000|CC1|TO A VIRGIN ENGAGED             
20101225075645.000|20101225075645.000|CC1|TO A MAN NAMED JOSEPH,          
20101225075645.000|20101225075649.000|CC1|OF THE HOUSE OF DAVID,          
20101225075649.000|20101225075649.000|CC1|AND THE VIRGIN'S NAME           
20101225075649.000|20101225075652.000|CC1|      WAS MARY.                 
20101225075652.000|20101225075654.000|CC1|        AND GABRIEL CAME TO MARY
20101225075654.000|20101225075654.000|CC1|           AND SAID, "GREETINGS,
20101225075654.000|20101225075658.000|CC1|               FAVORED ONE!     
20101225075658.000|20101225075700.000|CC1|              GOD IS WITH YOU." 
20101225075700.000|20101225075700.000|CC1|BUT MARY WAS MUCH PERPLEXED     
20101225075700.000|20101225075706.000|CC1|   BY THE ANGEL'S WORDS         
20101225075706.000|20101225075706.000|CC1|AND PONDERED WHAT SORT OF       
20101225075706.000|20101225075711.000|CC1| GREETING THIS MIGHT BE.        
20101225075711.000|20101225075714.000|CC1|             AND THE ANGEL SAID,
20101225075714.000|20101225075715.000|CC1|        "DO NOT BE AFRAID, MARY,
20101225075715.000|20101225075715.000|CC1|        FOR YOU HAVE FOUND FAVOR
20101225075715.000|20101225075718.000|CC1|                WITH GOD.       
20101225075718.000|20101225075718.000|CC1|          FOR, BEHOLD, YOU WILL 
20101225075718.000|20101225075723.000|CC1|        CONCEIVE AND BEAR A SON,
20101225075723.000|20101225075723.000|CC1|          AND YOU SHALL NAME HIM
20101225075723.000|20101225075727.000|CC1|                  JESUS.        
20101225075727.000|20101225075727.000|CC1|             HE WILL BE GREAT,  
20101225075727.000|20101225075729.000|CC1|           AND HE WILL BE CALLED
20101225075729.000|20101225075729.000|CC1|                 'THE SON OF    
20101225075729.000|20101225075731.000|CC1|               THE MOST HIGH,'  
20101225075731.000|20101225075731.000|CC1|              AND GOD WILL GIVE 
20101225075731.000|20101225075734.000|CC1|              TO HIM THE THRONE 
20101225075734.000|20101225075736.000|CC1|          OF HIS ANCESTOR DAVID.
20101225075736.000|20101225075736.000|CC1|         HE WILL REIGN OVER     
20101225075736.000|20101225075739.000|CC1|     THE HOUSE OF JACOB FOREVER,
20101225075739.000|20101225075742.000|CC1|             AND OF HIS KINGDOM 
20101225075742.000|20101225075744.000|CC1|          THERE WILL BE NO END."
20101225075744.000|20101225075748.000|CC1|BUT MARY SAID TO THE ANGEL,     
20101225075748.000|20101225075748.000|CC1|"HOW CAN THIS BE SO,            
20101225075748.000|20101225075754.000|CC1|WHEN I AM A VIRGIN?"            
20101225075754.000|20101225075754.000|CC1|             AND THE ANGEL SAID 
20101225075754.000|20101225075756.000|CC1|                   TO HER,      
20101225075756.000|20101225075756.000|CC1|           "THE HOLY SPIRIT WILL
20101225075756.000|20101225075759.000|CC1|              COME UPON YOU,    
20101225075759.000|20101225075759.000|CC1|       AND THE POWER OF THE MOST
20101225075759.000|20101225075803.000|CC1|       HIGH WILL OVERSHADOW YOU.

20101225075803.000|20101225075807.000|CC1|            TO BE BORN TO YOU

20101225080445.000|20101225080448.000|CC1|            TOGETHER.           
20101225080448.000|20101225080448.000|CC1|   WE'RE DIVIDED BY POLITICS,   
20101225080448.000|20101225080453.000|CC1|        BY ETHNIC GROUPS,       
20101225080453.000|20101225080453.000|CC1|  BY LANGUAGE, RACE, RELIGION,  
20101225080453.000|20101225080457.000|CC1|       SEXUAL ORIENTATION,      
20101225080457.000|20101225080457.000|CC1|     BY GENDER, BY CLASS --     
20101225080457.000|20101225080500.000|CC1|         WE'RE DIVIDED.         
20101225080500.000|20101225080503.000|CC1|   WE'RE NOT TOGETHER, ISAIAH.  
20101225080503.000|20101225080503.000|CC1|    WE TAKE DIFFERENT STANDS    
20101225080503.000|20101225080507.000|CC1|           ON THINGS.           
20101225080507.000|20101225080507.000|CC1|   WE COME FROM VERY DIFFERENT  
20101225080507.000|20101225080512.000|CC1|      PLACES ABOUT THINGS.      
20101225080512.000|20101225080512.000|CC1|  WE LIVE IN DIFFERENT WORLDS,  
20101225080512.000|20101225080515.000|CC1| AND EVERYTHING LOOKS DIFFERENT,
20101225080515.000|20101225080515.000|CC1|        DEPENDS ON WHERE        
20101225080515.000|20101225080519.000|CC1|       WE'RE COMING FROM.       
20101225080519.000|20101225080519.000|CC1|    SO, WHAT DOES ISAIAH MEAN   
20101225080519.000|20101225080525.000|CC1|         BY THIS PROMISE        
20101225080525.000|20101225080525.000|CC1|    THAT ALL PEOPLE WILL SEE    
20101225080525.000|20101225080529.000|CC1|   THE GLORY OF GOD TOGETHER?   
20101225080529.000|20101225080529.000|CC1|       DOESN'T ISAIAH KNOW      
20101225080529.000|20101225080533.000|CC1|       HOW DIVIDED WE ARE?      
20101225080533.000|20101225080533.000|CC1| DOESN'T GOD KNOW HOW ALIENATED 
20101225080533.000|20101225080537.000|CC1|      WE SO QUICKLY BECOME      
20101225080537.000|20101225080541.000|CC1|        FROM EACH OTHER?        
20101225080541.000|20101225080541.000|CC1|   BUT, IT WAS INTO JUST SUCH   
20101225080541.000|20101225080545.000|CC1| AN ALIENATED AND DIVIDED WORLD 
20101225080545.000|20101225080548.000|CC1|   THAT JESUS CAME TO BE BORN   
20101225080548.000|20101225080551.000|CC1|     IN BETHLEHEM IN JUDEA.     
20101225080551.000|20101225080553.000|CC1|         AND WHO SAW IT?        
20101225080553.000|20101225080555.000|CC1|      WHO SAW IT TOGETHER?      
20101225080555.000|20101225080555.000|CC1|        WHO WAS TOGETHER        
20101225080555.000|20101225080558.000|CC1|       TO SEE IT THAT DAY?      
20101225080558.000|20101225080600.000|CC1|            NOT MANY.           
20101225080600.000|20101225080601.000|CC1|           NOT MANY.            
20101225080601.000|20101225080604.000|CC1|       HIS MOM, HIS DAD,        
20101225080604.000|20101225080606.000|CC1|        SOME SHEPHERDS,         
20101225080606.000|20101225080606.000|CC1|    A COUPLE OF SUSPICIOUS      
20101225080606.000|20101225080612.000|CC1|    CHARACTERS ON CAMELS.       
20101225080612.000|20101225080614.000|CC1|         NO RELATIVES.          
20101225080614.000|20101225080614.000|CC1|        SHE GIVES BIRTH         
20101225080614.000|20101225080618.000|CC1|      TOO FAR FROM HOME.        
20101225080618.000|20101225080618.000|CC1|THE ANGELS WHO HAVE BEEN AROUND,
20101225080618.000|20101225080622.000|CC1|      ANNOUNCING TO MARY,       
20101225080622.000|20101225080624.000|CC1|     ANNOUNCING TO JOSEPH,      
20101225080624.000|20101225080624.000|CC1|  ANNOUNCING TO THE SHEPHERDS   
20101225080624.000|20101225080627.000|CC1|        AND THE MAGI --         
20101225080627.000|20101225080628.000|CC1|        WHERE ARE THEY?         
20101225080628.000|20101225080628.000|CC1|    THEY DON'T EVEN SHOW UP     
20101225080628.000|20101225080631.000|CC1|        AT THE MANGER.          
20101225080631.000|20101225080635.000|CC1|IS THIS WHAT ISAIAH HAD IN MIND?
20101225080635.000|20101225080635.000|CC1|       IS THIS WHAT GOD         
20101225080635.000|20101225080639.000|CC1|  HAD IN MIND FOR THIS MOMENT   
20101225080639.000|20101225080641.000|CC1|        OF GOD'S GLORY?         
20101225080641.000|20101225080642.000|CC1|        DOES THAT BABY,         
20101225080642.000|20101225080642.000|CC1|      LYING THERE WRAPPED       
20101225080642.000|20101225080646.000|CC1|  IN RANDOM SCRAPS OF CLOTH,    
20101225080646.000|20101225080646.000|CC1|       PLACED LYING DOWN        
20101225080646.000|20101225080651.000|CC1|     IN A FEEDING TROUGH,       
20101225080651.000|20101225080651.000|CC1| DOES THAT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO  
20101225080651.000|20101225080655.000|CC1|    WITH THE GLORY OF GOD?      
20101225080655.000|20101225080658.000|CC1|            AND...              
20101225080658.000|20101225080658.000|CC1|    IF EVERYONE SHOULD SEE      
20101225080658.000|20101225080701.000|CC1|  THE GLORY OF GOD TOGETHER,    
20101225080701.000|20101225080701.000|CC1|     WHY WERE SO FEW THERE      
20101225080701.000|20101225080705.000|CC1|         ON THAT DAY?           
20101225080705.000|20101225080705.000|CC1|  I'D LIKE TO INVITE US TODAY   
20101225080705.000|20101225080708.000|CC1|       TO SEE THAT BIRTH        
20101225080708.000|20101225080708.000|CC1|       THE WAY GOD SEES         
20101225080708.000|20101225080711.000|CC1|          THAT BIRTH,           
20101225080711.000|20101225080711.000|CC1|     AS SOME MANIFESTATION      
20101225080711.000|20101225080716.000|CC1|       OF GOD'S GLORY --        
20101225080716.000|20101225080719.000|CC1|   GOD'S KABOD, IN HEBREW --    
20101225080719.000|20101225080719.000|CC1|      GOD'S WEIGHTINESS,        
20101225080719.000|20101225080723.000|CC1|      GOD'S SERIOUSNESS,        
20101225080723.000|20101225080723.000|CC1|       GOD'S SUBSTANCE,         
20101225080723.000|20101225080728.000|CC1|     AND GOD'S IMPORTANCE,      
20101225080728.000|20101225080730.000|CC1|         GOD'S GLORY.           
20101225080730.000|20101225080730.000|CC1|       HOW ARE WE GOING         
20101225080730.000|20101225080732.000|CC1|          TO DO THAT?           
20101225080732.000|20101225080732.000|CC1|  HOW CAN WE SEE IT TOGETHER    
20101225080732.000|20101225080737.000|CC1|         WHEN WE KNOW           
20101225080737.000|20101225080739.000|CC1|     WE'RE SO SPLIT APART?      
20101225080739.000|20101225080739.000|CC1|OF COURSE, THOSE OF US WHO LIVE 
20101225080739.000|20101225080744.000|CC1|    HERE IN NEW YORK CITY,      
20101225080744.000|20101225080744.000|CC1|     WE'RE THROWN TOGETHER      
20101225080744.000|20101225080747.000|CC1|         ALL THE TIME.          
20101225080747.000|20101225080749.000|CC1|     WE DO THINGS TOGETHER      
20101225080749.000|20101225080749.000|CC1|         ALL THE TIME,          
20101225080749.000|20101225080751.000|CC1|        LIKE IT OR NOT.         
20101225080751.000|20101225080751.000|CC1|     WE'RE PILED ON TOP OF      
20101225080751.000|20101225080754.000|CC1| EACH OTHER IN WHERE WE LIVE.   
20101225080754.000|20101225080755.000|CC1|    WE GO TO WORK TOGETHER      
20101225080755.000|20101225080755.000|CC1|  AND WE COME HOME FROM WORK    
20101225080755.000|20101225080800.000|CC1|           TOGETHER,            
20101225080800.000|20101225080800.000|CC1|    IN PACKED SUBWAY CARS,      
20101225080800.000|20101225080805.000|CC1|   NOSE TO INTERESTING NOSE.    
20101225080805.000|20101225080805.000|CC1| WE EAT LOTS OF MEALS TOGETHER  
20101225080805.000|20101225080809.000|CC1|  IN RESTAURANTS SO CROWDED,    
20101225080809.000|20101225080809.000|CC1|     I SOMETIMES FEEL LIKE      
20101225080809.000|20101225080812.000|CC1|     THE WAITER IS TRYING       
20101225080812.000|20101225080812.000|CC1|     TO SIT ME ON THE LAP       
20101225080812.000|20101225080817.000|CC1|     OF A TOTAL STRANGER.       
20101225080817.000|20101225080817.000|CC1|     WE HANG OUT TOGETHER       
20101225080817.000|20101225080820.000|CC1|     IN PARKS AND DOG RUNS      
20101225080820.000|20101225080820.000|CC1|     INSTEAD OF BACKYARDS,      
20101225080820.000|20101225080822.000|CC1|      SO WE'RE TOGETHER.        
20101225080822.000|20101225080822.000|CC1|  WE MAY NOT LIKE "TOGETHER,"   
20101225080822.000|20101225080824.000|CC1|      BUT WE'RE TOGETHER.       
20101225080824.000|20101225080824.000|CC1|       BUT EVEN WITH ALL        
20101225080824.000|20101225080829.000|CC1| OF THAT FORCED TOGETHERNESS,   
20101225080829.000|20101225080829.000|CC1| DON'T WE OFTEN FIND OURSELVES  
20101225080829.000|20101225080835.000|CC1|      LIVING LIVES APART,       
20101225080835.000|20101225080835.000|CC1|      SEPARATED, DIVIDED,       
20101225080835.000|20101225080839.000|CC1|           ISOLATED             
20101225080839.000|20101225080841.000|CC1|       FROM EACH OTHER,         
20101225080841.000|20101225080841.000|CC1|  EVEN IN A PLACE AS FULL OF    
20101225080841.000|20101225080847.000|CC1|GOD'S PEOPLE AS NEW YORK CITY?  
20101225080847.000|20101225080847.000|CC1|     BUT WHEREVER WE LIVE,      
20101225080847.000|20101225080852.000|CC1|  WHEREVER WE FIND OURSELVES,   
20101225080852.000|20101225080856.000|CC1|WE FIND OURSELVES FORCED APART  
20101225080856.000|20101225080858.000|CC1|  BY ALL OF OUR DIFFERENCES.    
20101225080858.000|20101225080858.000|CC1|     POLITICALLY, WE'RE IN      
20101225080858.000|20101225080901.000|CC1|  DIFFERENT CAMPS, AREN'T WE?   
20101225080901.000|20101225080901.000|CC1|      IT'S HARD TO FIND         
20101225080901.000|20101225080903.000|CC1|      ANY MIDDLE GROUND.        
20101225080903.000|20101225080903.000|CC1|   COOPERATION, WE'RE TOLD,     
20101225080903.000|20101225080906.000|CC1|        IS IMPOSSIBLE,          
20101225080906.000|20101225080906.000|CC1|         AND, ANYWAY,           
20101225080906.000|20101225080910.000|CC1|    IT'S COUNTERPRODUCTIVE?     
20101225080910.000|20101225080910.000|CC1|RELIGIOUSLY, WE EYE EACH OTHER  
20101225080910.000|20101225080916.000|CC1|        WITH SUSPICION.         
20101225080916.000|20101225080918.000|CC1|    WE THINK CHRISTIANS ARE     
20101225080918.000|20101225080922.000|CC1| SMALL MINDED -- IMAGINE THAT.  
20101225080922.000|20101225080922.000|CC1|WE THINK MUSLIMS MUST SECRETLY  
20101225080922.000|20101225080927.000|CC1|       SUPPORT VIOLENCE.        
20101225080927.000|20101225080930.000|CC1|       OR WE THINK JEWS         
20101225080930.000|20101225080930.000|CC1|        ONLY CARE ABOUT         
20101225080930.000|20101225080934.000|CC1|     THE STATE OF ISRAEL.       
20101225080934.000|20101225080938.000|CC1|    AND IT GOES ON AND ON.      
20101225080938.000|20101225080940.000|CC1|       AND YET, GOD HAS         
20101225080940.000|20101225080943.000|CC1|  A DIFFERENT IDEA THAN THAT.   
20101225080943.000|20101225080945.000|CC1|    GOD REJECTS THAT IDEA.      
20101225080945.000|20101225080945.000|CC1|AND ISAIAH GIVES US A DIFFERENT 
20101225080945.000|20101225080949.000|CC1|   VISION FROM ALL OF THAT.     
20101225080949.000|20101225080949.000|CC1|    NO MATTER HOW MESSED UP     
20101225080949.000|20101225080952.000|CC1|        OUR LIVES GET,          
20101225080952.000|20101225080952.000|CC1|         NO MATTER HOW          
20101225080952.000|20101225080955.000|CC1| MESSED UP OUR THINKING GETS,   
20101225080955.000|20101225080955.000|CC1|NO MATTER HOW BENT OUT OF SHAPE 
20101225080955.000|20101225080959.000|CC1|      WE FIND OURSELVES,        
20101225080959.000|20101225080959.000|CC1|  GOD HAS A DIFFERENT VISION    
20101225080959.000|20101225081001.000|CC1|            FOR US.             
20101225081001.000|20101225081001.000|CC1|     LIFE HAS PUT US DOWN,      
20101225081001.000|20101225081008.000|CC1|ISAIAH SAYS WE'LL BE RAISED UP. 
20101225081008.000|20101225081008.000|CC1|  CIRCUMSTANCES HAVE LEFT US    
20101225081008.000|20101225081011.000|CC1|            FEELING             
20101225081011.000|20101225081011.000|CC1|        KIND OF CROOKED         
20101225081011.000|20101225081013.000|CC1|        AND BENT DOWN?          
20101225081013.000|20101225081013.000|CC1|          ISAIAH SAYS           
20101225081013.000|20101225081018.000|CC1|  WE CAN BE STRAIGHTENED OUT.   
20101225081018.000|20101225081018.000|CC1|  THE OTHER DAY, I WAS TRYING   
20101225081018.000|20101225081020.000|CC1|        TO PUT TOGETHER         
20101225081020.000|20101225081020.000|CC1|     A LONG, THIN PLATFORM      
20101225081020.000|20101225081023.000|CC1|FOR THE BACK ROW OF THE CHOIR.  
20101225081023.000|20101225081023.000|CC1|   I WISH YOU COULD SEE IT,     
20101225081023.000|20101225081028.000|CC1|   IT'S A THING OF BEAUTY.      
20101225081028.000|20101225081028.000|CC1|         I FOUND, DOWN          
20101225081028.000|20101225081031.000|CC1|      IN THE BOILER ROOM,       
20101225081031.000|20101225081033.000|CC1|     SOME 12-FOOT PLANKS.       
20101225081033.000|20101225081033.000|CC1|    I HAD TO BUY THE BEAMS,     
20101225081033.000|20101225081036.000|CC1|    BUT WHEN I BOUGHT THEM,     
20101225081036.000|20101225081036.000|CC1|   I HAD THEM CUT PRECISELY     
20101225081036.000|20101225081038.000|CC1|          TO MEASURE            
20101225081038.000|20101225081038.000|CC1|       SO I DIDN'T MESS         
20101225081038.000|20101225081040.000|CC1|         ANYTHING UP.           
20101225081040.000|20101225081042.000|CC1| I TOOK THEM IN THE BACK ROOM   
20101225081042.000|20101225081042.000|CC1|   WHERE MY FRIEND WILLIAM,     
20101225081042.000|20101225081045.000|CC1|   WHO'S A MASTER CARPENTER,    
20101225081045.000|20101225081045.000|CC1|           WAS DOING            
20101225081045.000|20101225081050.000|CC1|     SOME CABINETRY WORK.       
20101225081050.000|20101225081050.000|CC1|      I ASKED IF I COULD        
20101225081050.000|20101225081053.000|CC1|      BORROW HIS TOOLS,         
20101225081053.000|20101225081054.000|CC1|      AND WILLIAM NODDED.       
20101225081054.000|20101225081054.000|CC1|   HE WATCHED ME LAYING OUT     
20101225081054.000|20101225081058.000|CC1|   THE BEAMS ON THE FLOOR.      
20101225081058.000|20101225081058.000|CC1|     HE WATCHED ME LAY ON       
20101225081058.000|20101225081103.000|CC1|         THE PLANKING.          
20101225081103.000|20101225081103.000|CC1|   WILLIAM WATCHED ME UNTIL     
20101225081103.000|20101225081107.000|CC1| HE COULDN'T STAND IT ANYMORE.  
20101225081107.000|20101225081107.000|CC1|  HE GOT DOWN OFF HIS LADDER    
20101225081107.000|20101225081112.000|CC1|      AND CAME TO MY AID.       
20101225081112.000|20101225081112.000|CC1|"THESE BOARDS ARE ALL CROOKED," 
20101225081112.000|20101225081115.000|CC1|HE SAID, "THEY'RE ALL WARPED."  
20101225081115.000|20101225081115.000|CC1|     I SAID, "YEAH, WELL,       
20101225081115.000|20101225081117.000|CC1|       WHAT CAN YOU DO?         
20101225081117.000|20101225081117.000|CC1|         I FOUND THEM           
20101225081117.000|20101225081119.000|CC1|      IN THE BOILER ROOM.       
20101225081119.000|20101225081119.000|CC1|    THEY'RE JUST THAT WAY.      
20101225081119.000|20101225081121.000|CC1|    I FOUND THEM THAT WAY.      
20101225081121.000|20101225081121.000|CC1|     WE'VE GOT TO USE THEM      
20101225081121.000|20101225081124.000|CC1|           THAT WAY.            
20101225081124.000|20101225081124.000|CC1|     BUT, YOU KNOW, I HAD       
20101225081124.000|20101225081125.000|CC1|           AN IDEA.             
20101225081125.000|20101225081125.000|CC1|I THOUGHT, IF WE GOT ALL OF THEM
20101225081125.000|20101225081129.000|CC1|LINED UP SO THAT THEY'RE WARPED 
20101225081129.000|20101225081129.000|CC1| IN THE SAME WAY, IT WOULD FIT  
20101225081129.000|20101225081133.000|CC1|TOGETHER KIND OF LIKE A PUZZLE."
20101225081133.000|20101225081133.000|CC1|  WILLIAM JUST LOOKED AT ME,    
20101225081133.000|20101225081138.000|CC1|     THEN HE TOOK A BOARD       
20101225081138.000|20101225081138.000|CC1|    AND HE SCREWED ONE END      
20101225081138.000|20101225081140.000|CC1|     INTO PLACE IN A BEAM       
20101225081140.000|20101225081140.000|CC1|   AND THEN HE BEGAN TO PRY     
20101225081140.000|20101225081144.000|CC1|   THE REST OF IT STRAIGHT,     
20101225081144.000|20101225081144.000|CC1|      AS HE ATTACHED IT,        
20101225081144.000|20101225081146.000|CC1|     BEAM BY BEAM BY BEAM.      
20101225081146.000|20101225081146.000|CC1|AND, BY THE END OF THIS PROCESS,
20101225081146.000|20101225081150.000|CC1|       IT WAS STRAIGHT.         
20101225081150.000|20101225081153.000|CC1|    AS STRAIGHT AS A BOARD.     
20101225081153.000|20101225081153.000|CC1|         I SAID, "WOW!          
20101225081153.000|20101225081158.000|CC1|         COOL TRICK."           
20101225081158.000|20101225081158.000|CC1| WILLIAM JUST LOOKED AT ME --   
20101225081158.000|20101225081202.000|CC1|       FINALLY, HE SAID,        
20101225081202.000|20101225081202.000|CC1|       "DON'T FEEL BAD,         
20101225081202.000|20101225081205.000|CC1|    EVERYBODY'S DIFFERENT.      
20101225081205.000|20101225081205.000|CC1|EVERYBODY HAS DIFFERENT THINGS  
20101225081205.000|20101225081208.000|CC1|      THEY'RE GOOD AT, K.       
20101225081208.000|20101225081208.000|CC1|       GOD LOOKED AT ME         
20101225081208.000|20101225081210.000|CC1|           AND SAID,            
20101225081210.000|20101225081210.000|CC1|     'THAT GUY WOULD MAKE       
20101225081210.000|20101225081212.000|CC1|   A PRETTY GOOD CARPENTER.'    
20101225081212.000|20101225081212.000|CC1|    GOD WILL FIND SOMETHING     
20101225081212.000|20101225081215.000|CC1|        FOR YOU, TOO."          
20101225081215.000|20101225081215.000|CC1|   "YOU KNOW, WILLIAM, JESUS    
20101225081215.000|20101225081218.000|CC1|   WAS A CARPENTER," I SAID.    
20101225081218.000|20101225081223.000|CC1|AND WILLIAM JUST LOOKED AT ME.  
20101225081223.000|20101225081223.000|CC1|   THE GOOD NEWS IS THIS --     
20101225081223.000|20101225081227.000|CC1|THE GOOD NEWS IS THAT GOD SEES  
20101225081227.000|20101225081229.000|CC1|        THE WAY WE ARE.         
20101225081229.000|20101225081229.000|CC1|          GOD SEES US           
20101225081229.000|20101225081231.000|CC1|        THE WAY WE ARE.         
20101225081231.000|20101225081231.000|CC1|       KNOWS WHAT WE'RE         
20101225081231.000|20101225081233.000|CC1|           GOOD AT.             
20101225081233.000|20101225081233.000|CC1|   AND GOD ALSO LOOKS AT US     
20101225081233.000|20101225081236.000|CC1|           AND SEES

20101225081236.000|20101225081240.000|CC1|STRAIGHTENED OUT A LITTLE BIT.  
20101225081240.000|20101225081240.000|CC1|   GOD KNOWS US BETTER THAN     
20101225081240.000|20101225081246.000|CC1|      WE KNOW OURSELVES.        
20101225081246.000|20101225081246.000|CC1|    AND GOD LOVES US BETTER     
20101225081246.000|20101225081250.000|CC1|    THAN WE LIKE OURSELVES.     
20101225081250.000|20101225081250.000|CC1|   AND GOD SEES THAT THERE'S    
20101225081250.000|20101225081254.000|CC1|          MORE TO US            
20101225081254.000|20101225081256.000|CC1|  THAN WHAT WE ARE RIGHT NOW.   
20101225081256.000|20101225081256.000|CC1|     GOD LOOKS AT THE WORLD     
20101225081256.000|20101225081259.000|CC1|          THE SAME WAY.         
20101225081259.000|20101225081300.000|CC1|        THANKS BE TO GOD.       
20101225081300.000|20101225081300.000|CC1|    CROWDED AS THE WORLD IS,    
20101225081300.000|20101225081303.000|CC1|    NOBODY SHOULD BE LONELY.    
20101225081303.000|20101225081303.000|CC1|    THERE'S PLENTY OF PEOPLE    
20101225081303.000|20101225081306.000|CC1|          TO GO AROUND.         
20101225081306.000|20101225081306.000|CC1|    AND YET, WE KNOW SOMEBODY   
20101225081306.000|20101225081311.000|CC1|    IN OUR LIVES, EACH OF US,   
20101225081311.000|20101225081311.000|CC1|     WHO'S FEELING ISOLATED     
20101225081311.000|20101225081314.000|CC1|    AND LONELY AND ALIENATED.   
20101225081314.000|20101225081314.000|CC1| AND WE HAVEN'T QUITE BEEN ABLE 
20101225081314.000|20101225081317.000|CC1|          TO CALL THEM,         
20101225081317.000|20101225081319.000|CC1|      FOR WHATEVER REASON.      
20101225081319.000|20101225081320.000|CC1|   WE HAVEN'T QUITE BEEN ABLE   
20101225081320.000|20101225081320.000|CC1|       TO CHECK IN ON THEM      
20101225081320.000|20101225081324.000|CC1|   AND SEE HOW THEY'RE DOING.   
20101225081324.000|20101225081324.000|CC1|    AND I KNOW IT'S NOT EASY    
20101225081324.000|20101225081327.000|CC1|           SOMETIMES.           
20101225081327.000|20101225081327.000|CC1|           BUT WE NEED          
20101225081327.000|20101225081331.000|CC1|  TO STRAIGHTEN OUT THAT BOARD. 
20101225081331.000|20101225081332.000|CC1|  PEOPLE SHOULDN'T BE HOMELESS. 
20101225081332.000|20101225081332.000|CC1|   WE KNOW PEOPLE SHOULDN'T BE  
20101225081332.000|20101225081335.000|CC1|            HOMELESS.           
20101225081335.000|20101225081336.000|CC1|      EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE      
20101225081336.000|20101225081341.000|CC1|  A WARM, SAFE PLACE TO SLEEP.  
20101225081341.000|20101225081341.000|CC1| AND YET TONIGHT, THERE WILL BE 
20101225081341.000|20101225081344.000|CC1|         PEOPLE SLEEPING        
20101225081344.000|20101225081344.000|CC1|  ON THE STEPS OF THIS CHURCH,  
20101225081344.000|20101225081347.000|CC1|       AND OTHER CHURCHES,      
20101225081347.000|20101225081347.000|CC1|    AND ON THE SIDEWALK NEAR    
20101225081347.000|20101225081350.000|CC1|    YOUR APARTMENT BUILDING,    
20101225081350.000|20101225081350.000|CC1|  AND THAT'S A BOARD THAT NEEDS 
20101225081350.000|20101225081354.000|CC1|     TO BE STRAIGHTENED OUT.    
20101225081354.000|20101225081356.000|CC1|   PEOPLE SHOULDN'T BE HUNGRY.  
20101225081356.000|20101225081356.000|CC1|       GOOD FOOD SHOULD BE      
20101225081356.000|20101225081400.000|CC1|       AS AVAILABLE TO US       
20101225081400.000|20101225081403.000|CC1|   AS THE AIR THAT WE BREATHE   
20101225081403.000|20101225081403.000|CC1|          AND THE WATER         
20101225081403.000|20101225081406.000|CC1|  WE'RE LUCKY ENOUGH TO DRINK.  
20101225081406.000|20101225081406.000|CC1|    BUT OUR FOOD PANTRY HERE    
20101225081406.000|20101225081410.000|CC1|      HAS BEEN OVERWHELMED,     
20101225081410.000|20101225081410.000|CC1|        FILLED WITH NEWLY       
20101225081410.000|20101225081413.000|CC1|        UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE       
20101225081413.000|20101225081413.000|CC1|      WHO NEVER HAD TO SEEK     
20101225081413.000|20101225081417.000|CC1|    THAT KIND OF HELP BEFORE    
20101225081417.000|20101225081419.000|CC1|        AND NOW THEY DO.        
20101225081419.000|20101225081421.000|CC1|       AND THAT'S A BOARD       
20101225081421.000|20101225081421.000|CC1|   WE'VE GOT TO WORK TOGETHER   
20101225081421.000|20101225081424.000|CC1|      ON STRAIGHTENING OUT.     
20101225081424.000|20101225081424.000|CC1|      KIDS SHOULDN'T FIGHT      
20101225081424.000|20101225081427.000|CC1|        FOR AN EDUCATION.       
20101225081427.000|20101225081427.000|CC1|  KIDS SHOULD NOT HAVE TO FIGHT 
20101225081427.000|20101225081430.000|CC1|      TO GET AN EDUCATION.

20101225081752.000|20101225081757.000|CC1|    ? OH, YES, I KNOW ?         
20101225081757.000|20101225081800.000|CC1|      AMEN!                     
20101225081800.000|20101225081803.000|CC1|          FROM LUKE 2,          
20101225081803.000|20101225081805.000|CC1|THE STORY OF CHRISTMAS.         
20101225081805.000|20101225081805.000|CC1| IN THOSE DAYS,                 
20101225081805.000|20101225081808.000|CC1|A DECREE WENT OUT               
20101225081808.000|20101225081809.000|CC1|FROM CAESAR AUGUSTUS            
20101225081809.000|20101225081809.000|CC1|THAT THE WHOLE EMPIRE           
20101225081809.000|20101225081813.000|CC1|SHOULD BE REGISTERED.           
20101225081813.000|20101225081813.000|CC1|       THIS WAS                 
20101225081813.000|20101225081815.000|CC1|THE FIRST REGISTRATION,         
20101225081815.000|20101225081815.000|CC1|UNDERTAKEN WHILE QUIRINIUS      
20101225081815.000|20101225081819.000|CC1|  WAS GOVERNOR OF SYRIA.        
20101225081819.000|20101225081819.000|CC1|AND ALL WENT TO THEIR OWN TOWNS 
20101225081819.000|20101225081824.000|CC1|       TO BE REGISTERED.        
20101225081824.000|20101225081826.000|CC1|              JOSEPH ALSO WENT. 
20101225081826.000|20101225081826.000|CC1|       HE TRAVELED FROM THE TOWN
20101225081826.000|20101225081829.000|CC1|        OF NAZARETH IN GALILEE, 
20101225081829.000|20101225081829.000|CC1|         TO JUDEA, TO THE CITY  
20101225081829.000|20101225081832.000|CC1|      OF DAVID CALLED BETHLEHEM,
20101225081832.000|20101225081833.000|CC1|        BECAUSE HE WAS DESCENDED
20101225081833.000|20101225081833.000|CC1|             FROM THE HOUSE     
20101225081833.000|20101225081836.000|CC1|        AND THE FAMILY OF DAVID.
20101225081836.000|20101225081836.000|CC1|            HE WENT THERE TO BE 
20101225081836.000|20101225081838.000|CC1|           REGISTERED WITH MARY,
20101225081838.000|20101225081839.000|CC1|         TO WHOM HE WAS ENGAGED.
20101225081839.000|20101225081839.000|CC1|MARY WAS EXPECTING              
20101225081839.000|20101225081841.000|CC1|    HER CHILD.                  
20101225081841.000|20101225081841.000|CC1|AND WHILE THEY WERE             
20101225081841.000|20101225081846.000|CC1|THERE IN BETHLEHEM,             
20101225081846.000|20101225081846.000|CC1|THE TIME CAME FOR MARY          
20101225081846.000|20101225081850.000|CC1|TO DELIVER HER CHILD.           
20101225081850.000|20101225081850.000|CC1| AND SHE GAVE BIRTH             
20101225081850.000|20101225081854.000|CC1|TO HER FIRST-BORN SON           
20101225081854.000|20101225081854.000|CC1|AND WRAPPED HIM IN BANDS        
20101225081854.000|20101225081857.000|CC1|        OF CLOTH,               
20101225081857.000|20101225081859.000|CC1|AND LAID HIM IN A MANGER,       
20101225081859.000|20101225081859.000|CC1|BECAUSE THERE WAS NO PLACE      
20101225081859.000|20101225081902.000|CC1|   FOR THEM IN THE INN.         
20101225081902.000|20101225081905.000|CC1|              THANKS BE TO GOD! 
20101225081905.000|20101225081908.000|CC1|? ANGELS WE HAVE HEARD ON HIGH ?
20101225081908.000|20101225081911.000|CC1|       ? SWEETLY SINGING ?      
20101225081911.000|20101225081913.000|CC1|      ? THROUGH THE NIGHT ?     
20101225081913.000|20101225081917.000|CC1| ? AND THE MOUNTAINS IN REPLY ? 
20101225081917.000|20101225081917.000|CC1|            ? ECHOING           
20101225081917.000|20101225081921.000|CC1|      THEIR BRAVE DELIGHT ?     
20101225081921.000|20101225081928.000|CC1|          ? GLO...RIA ?         
20101225081928.000|20101225081932.000|CC1|      ? IN EXCELSIS DEO! ?      
20101225081932.000|20101225081940.000|CC1|          ? GLO...RIA ?         
20101225081940.000|20101225081947.000|CC1|      ? IN EXCELSIS DEO! ?      
20101225081947.000|20101225081952.000|CC1|  ? SEE HIM IN A MANGER LAID ?  
20101225081952.000|20101225081955.000|CC1|? WHOM THE ANGELS PRAISE ABOVE ?
20101225081955.000|20101225081959.000|CC1| ? MARY, JOSEPH, LEND YOUR AID ?

20101225081959.000|20101225082003.000|CC1|            IN LOVE ?

20101225082023.000|20101225082036.000|CC1|      ? IN EXCELSIS DEO! ?      
20101225082036.000|20101225082036.000|CC1|   CONTINUING THE STORY         
20101225082036.000|20101225082039.000|CC1|       OF CHRISTMAS.            
20101225082039.000|20101225082039.000|CC1|      AND IN THAT REGION,       
20101225082039.000|20101225082042.000|CC1|      THERE WERE SHEPHERDS      
20101225082042.000|20101225082043.000|CC1|              OUT IN THE FIELD, 
20101225082043.000|20101225082043.000|CC1|            KEEPING WATCH OVER  
20101225082043.000|20101225082046.000|CC1|          THEIR FLOCKS BY NIGHT.
20101225082046.000|20101225082046.000|CC1|        AND AN ANGEL OF THE LORD
20101225082046.000|20101225082049.000|CC1|          APPEARED BEFORE THEM, 
20101225082049.000|20101225082049.000|CC1|       AND THE GLORY OF THE LORD
20101225082049.000|20101225082053.000|CC1|        SHONE ROUND ABOUT THEM, 
20101225082053.000|20101225082053.000|CC1|                AND THEY WERE   
20101225082053.000|20101225082056.000|CC1|              FILLED WITH FEAR. 
20101225082056.000|20101225082056.000|CC1|AND THE ANGEL SAID TO THEM,     
20101225082056.000|20101225082059.000|CC1|       "DO NOT FEAR,            
20101225082059.000|20101225082059.000|CC1|FOR, BEHOLD, I BRING YOU        
20101225082059.000|20101225082103.000|CC1|GOOD NEWS AND GREAT JOY,        
20101225082103.000|20101225082103.000|CC1|WHICH SHALL COME                
20101225082103.000|20101225082105.000|CC1| TO ALL PEOPLE,                 
20101225082105.000|20101225082105.000|CC1|  FOR UNTO YOU                  
20101225082105.000|20101225082107.000|CC1|IS BORN THIS DAY,               
20101225082107.000|20101225082107.000|CC1|IN THE CITY OF DAVID,           
20101225082107.000|20101225082110.000|CC1|      A SAVIOR,                 
20101225082110.000|20101225082110.000|CC1|WHO IS CHRIST                   
20101225082110.000|20101225082111.000|CC1|  THE LORD.                     
20101225082111.000|20101225082111.000|CC1|AND THIS SHALL BE               
20101225082111.000|20101225082114.000|CC1| A SIGN TO YOU:                 
20101225082114.000|20101225082114.000|CC1|   YOU WILL FIND THE BABY       
20101225082114.000|20101225082118.000|CC1|WRAPPED IN SWADDLING CLOTHES,   
20101225082118.000|20101225082120.000|CC1|LYING IN A MANGER."             
20101225082120.000|20101225082120.000|CC1|             AND, SUDDENLY,     
20101225082120.000|20101225082124.000|CC1|        THERE WAS WITH THE ANGEL
20101225082124.000|20101225082124.000|CC1|                A MULTITUDE     
20101225082124.000|20101225082126.000|CC1|           OF THE HEAVENLY HOST,
20101225082126.000|20101225082128.000|CC1|        PRAISING GOD AND SAYING,
